mapper.select: SELECT M.MNO MNO, M.MID MID, M.MPW MPW, M.MEMAIL MEMAIL, M.MNAME MNAME, M.MBIRTH MBIRTH, M.MPHOTO MPHOTO, M.MZONECODE MZONECODE, M.MROADADDRESS MROADADDRESS, M.MJIBUNADDRESS MJIBUNADDRESS, M.DELETEYN DELETEYN, TO_CHAR(M.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(M.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE, A.MAUTH MAUTH FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_AUTH A ON M.MNO = A.MNO WHERE M.MID = #{mid}
